toolset.name: Terminal
toolset.description: Bietet Werkzeuge zum Ausführen von Shell-Befehlen und Python-Code.

config.info_no_settings: Das Terminal-Toolset erfordert derzeit keine spezifische Konfiguration.
config.warn_write_failed: Fehler beim Schreiben von einer oder mehreren Konfigurationsdateien für das Terminal-Toolset. Überprüfen Sie die Protokolle.

terminal.cmd_desc: Der Befehl, der im Terminal ausgeführt werden soll.

direct_terminal.cmd_desc: Der Befehl, der direkt ausgeführt werden soll.

usage_guide.name: terminal_usage_guide
usage_guide.description: Displays usage instructions and context for the Terminal toolset.

terminal_hitl.name: run_terminal_command
terminal_hitl.description: Use to run any command in the terminal and return the output.

details.no_output_success: Status: Command completed successfully with no output.
details.no_output_fail: Status: Command failed with no output.

terminal_hitl.error_timeout:
Error: Command timed out after 300 seconds.
(Attempted: `{command}`)
terminal_hitl.error_not_found:
Error: Command not found: '{command_name}'. Ensure it's installed/in PATH.
(Attempted: `{command}`)

python_repl_hitl.name: python_repl
python_repl_hitl.description: Evaluates Python code snippets in a REPL environment, use only when requested to run a script or automation.
python_repl_hitl.error_no_code: Error: No Python code provided to execute.
python_repl_hitl.error_empty_confirmed: Error: Confirmed Python code is empty.

direct_terminal.name: _internal_direct_terminal
direct_terminal.description: Internal tool for direct command execution without HITL.

result_details.no_output_success: Command executed successfully with no output.
result_details.no_output_fail: Command failed with no output. Exit Code: {code}

direct_terminal.error_timeout:
Error: Command timed out after 300 seconds.
(Attempted: `{command}`)
